subtitle: maybe they all want a shortcut a secret
to how to keep their youth right deep
inside I know I'm not that young I know
myself I'm aging as much as I don't
think I look that young I could be a
person who look like a healthy version
of someone of my age who does not want
to look yum with that wrinkleless face
and fit physique today we are going to
learn how one can defy aging from
someone's story who is actually defied
aging Mr chuando Doan a multifaceted
person hailing from sing apore who is
well known for his work as a fashion
photographer model actor and author is
57 years old but he still defies the
effects of Aging a glimpse of his youth
in his 20s is a striking Testament to
his seemingly Timeless appearance born
in
1966 Mr chuando Tan has captured the
attention of social media users with his
remarkably young looks a phenomenon that
frequently causes onlookers to believe
he is in his 20s he firmly believes that
diet accounts for 70% of one's physical
appearance with exercise making up the
remaining 30% he Champions the widely
accepted 70 to30 concept which is a
holistic approach to weight management
and overall well-being training accounts
for only 30% of the 70% meaning that
what you put into your body truly
matters in this video we will explore
Chu's exercise routine and lifestyle
advice as well as his top dietary
choices for breakfast lunch and dinner
as well as the eight Foods he eats we
will also discuss the items that chuando
avoids in order to preserve his healthy
lifestyle and regular exercise schedule
so that you all can gain all the
information you have been longing to
know in his 50s shando continues to
exercised regularly despite his Advanced
age on a good week he might visit the
gym five times for a maximum of 1 and a
half hours each time but he frequently
makes it with just three sessions in his
gym sessions he splits his time between
strength and cardio training with
strength training taking up no more than
30 minutes cardio training is always
followed by jogging but he now walks
quickly on a treadmill because of a knee
injury another daily exercise is
swimming which he does at a swimming
pool in the evenings chuando appears
youthful because of his well-maintained
skin chuando claims that because of his
sensitive skin he doesn't do anything to
it he just uses two items every day
moisturizing cream and gel face wash hi
hydration is essential to his skincare
regimen which he achieves by drinking
lots of water and avoiding some drinks
though he acknowledges that he has a few
gray hairs which is a topic we'll
discuss later instead of going for the
salt and pepper appearance Chandler
chooses to use hair color as for plastic
surgery he has only tried one Botox
operation and it turned out to be an
unattractive gifted treatment in his
opinion he hasn't had any other cosmetic
procedures after then Stress Management
as stress can have a negative effect on
on our skin it is not surprising that
chuando is able to keep his stress
levels to a minimum what is his secret
according to him I have tried a lot of
different jobs before settling on what I
truly enjoy doing I love people I love
communication I love to set up photo
shoots and I love taking pictures
chuando directs his passion into many
initiatives including presenting a new
book this year and planning to publish
another next year he also routinely
participates in fashion photo sessions
as a photographer chuando chose a simple
br breast that consisted mostly of
protein six Poached Eggs graced his
plate but he only ate two of the yolks
to keep his cholesterol balanced Rich
Choice consisted of a tiny portion of
grilled veggies and a modest slice of
French toast eggs which are widely
available inexpensive and easily
digested are a great source of
highquality protein chando's choice is
in line with the nutritional advantages
of eggs which include a significant
amount of lutein and an amino acid
needed for muscle synthesis
eggs also provide important minerals
such vitamin D and omega-3 fatty acids
that are especially important for the
elderly among the popular and widely
regarded protein options are eggs at
home when he has more time to cook
breakfast he would make porridge with
milk eggs honey and avocado this dietary
pattern may help avoid sarcopenia the
age related reduction in muscle mass
typically noted in older persons in
addition he would scatter chia seeds B
glucan Rich oats are a rich source of
soluble fiber that actively lowers blood
glucose and cholesterol levels reducing
the risk of diabetes and heart disease
additionally betag glucan supports a
healthy gut microbiota and intestinal
well-being which prolongs feelings of
fullness additionally adding avocado and
chia seeds are both wise decisions
avocados are a good source of vitamin E
and folate chia seeds are also high in
fiber antioxidants minerals and heart
healthy Omega Three fatty acids avocados
have been linked to improvements in
heart disease and diabetes risk factors
as well as benefits for digestion and
good health at lunch and dinner avocados
have many nutrients that may help to
lower blood pressure manage cholesterol
and keep eyes healthy he just eats
chicken with rice or fish soup he
doesn't care if it tastes nice as long
as it's fresh when he eats fish soup he
concentrates on the flavor of the broth
and doesn't consume any carbohydrates
when it comes to rice and chicken he
choose chicken breast and the
carbohydrates are either a small portion
of brown rice or vegetables that he has
lightly marinated in olive oil and
balsamic vinegar the chicken is then
cooked in a toaster oven without the
addition of salt though he may flavor it
with a little dark soy sauce chuando
also likes to eat berries in the morning
and salads composed of fresh greens for
supper berries are the best fruits to
enjoy at age over 50 he likes to start
the day with berries when he's busy and
hasn't eaten he may quickly grab some
almonds or cashew nuts it will be about
10 almonds not a huge quantity in
healthy long life chuando relishes the
Sweet Taste of durians a tropical fruit
known as the king of fruits due to its
high nutritional content despite its
potent Aroma one cup of its pulp
contains 80% of the recommended daily
intake of vitamin C 40% of Manganese 61%
of thomine and vitamin B6 in addition to

magnesium and Nan durian is a rich

and other beneficial antioxidants ice
cream while chandu primarily likes
natural foods that aren't processed the
photographer acknowledges that ice cream
is his weakness and that's why he
occasionally indulges in it but those
cheat days are infrequent he would only
have ice cream once a month and even
then he would only have it in the
morning he would split a pint of vanilla
ice cream with three servings moderation
is necessary when consuming it when it
comes to Foods he avoids chuando follows
a list of guidelines that help us
understand the principles of clean and
healthy eating he prefers to consume
lean protein less carbohydrates and
occasionally nibble on Natural Foods
like berries and nuts except for ice
cream no sugar chuando avoids sugar
because according to Dr Nish of Unity
Point Health sugar scientifically speeds
up the aging process each strand of DNA
has a small cap called a tellor at the
end that Shields it from damage whenever
our DNA becomes red and duplicated sugar
shortens these towers and accelerates
the aging process he doesn't smoke or
drink alcohol in fact he once said in an
interview that he grew to like wine but
doesn't really drink it because alcohol
ages skin if you're trying to cleanse
your body by eating clean don't put the
toxins back in by drinking and smoking
instead eat clean and use less oil he
also avoids coffee and tea but drinks
plenty of water when he goes out to dine
he always goes for healthier selections
and always chooses the lighter broth
over the greasy one for Hot Pot mix he
tries not to drink the soup because it
has a lot of MSG and only eats veggies
and cured fish beans chuando claims that
although he is highly disciplined and
only occasionally eats tempera he also
enjoys the flavor of it most days he
keeps eating clean with no sauce when he
can chuando said he avoids eating sauce
on his food chuando claims that he
follows one last dietary habit he avoids
eating 7 hours before bed so these were
some of the activities opted by the
50-year-old chuando tan which he claims
help him look 30 years younger so the
key takeaways from this video is that
